mapper.insert: insert into complaint (complaint_id, waybill_id, complaint_detail, complaint_person, complaint_date) values (#{complaintId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complaintDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complaintPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complaintDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select complaint_id, waybill_id, complaint_detail, complaint_person, complaint_date from complaint
